net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h: BASE_URL = "https://character-service.dndbeyond.com/character/v3/character/"] [h: charId = json.get( macro.args, 0 )]
[h: charAt = lastIndexOf (charId, "/")]
[h, if (charAt > -1): charId = substring (charId, charAt + 1)]
[h: url = BASE_URL + charId] [h: log.info ("char url: " + url)] [h: character = REST.get(url)] [h: macro.return = character]

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip: Fetches the JSON package for the provided character number
